name: Qiankun Mora Meat
effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.
description: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?
